With a view to bring uniformity in processing and scrutiny 0f single tenders, it has been decided to uniformly follow the follqwing guidelines prescribed as under: - A. For EPC Contracts In case only a single bid is received by the due date of receipt; normally the tender process may be cancelled and re-bidding done by giving weeks notice except in cases where due to other reasons Iike difficult conditions, law and order the tender response is expected to be poor. JP In case of re-bidding  change from pre-qualification to post qualification may also be considered and resorted to if that would   help  increase response of tender In case re-bidding/change to post qualification also results in receipt of single bid then it should be opened and the bid amqunt  should be compared with the estimated project cost. In case the bid amount is within 15% of the estimated cost, then acceptance of the bid may be considered with proper justification and reasons iv) #f justification given for acceptance of the bid is found reasonable, then tender for EPC contract costing upto Rs 50 crore can be accepted by Chairman, NHAI and tender for the contract costing more than Rs 50 crore can be accepted with the approval of the Authority.
